data.title: Sanjay Dutt Filmography, Movies List, Box Office Collection with HIT or Flop Verdict
data.meta_description: Sanjay Dutt Filmography, Full Movies List from 1981-2019 with Box Office Verdict, Lifetime Collection, Business and Report.
data.meta_site_name: Box Office India, Bollywood, Collection, Movie Reviews
data.text:
Sanjay Dutt Filmography (FullMovies List) and Detailed Box Office Collection, Report with HIT or FLOP Verdict and Lifetime Business

Sanjay Dutt popularly known as 'Munnabhai' of Bollywood is easily one of the most leading stars and actors of Bollywood of all time. He shot to fame with his debut film Rocky in 1981 and rest is history. He then starred in many memorable Hits in the 80s, 90s, and 2000s Below we have done a detailed analysis of his film and box office. Check it.

We will try to update this periodically and whenever a new film is released. We will also try to update new sections whenever it is required or applicable.

Total Films -> 152

Total Films (minus Special Appearance, Voice and others) -> 126

Blockbuster (including ATBB) -> 3

Semi Hit -> 8

Average -> 15

Below Average -> 9

Flop -> 51

Disaster -> 18

Total No. of Hits -> 26

Total No. of Success -> 33

Total No. of Flops -> 69

Hit Ratio -> 20.63%

Success Ratio -> 26.19%

Flop Ratio -> 54.76%

Highest Grosser of The Year (HGOTY) -> 3

Highest Grosser of The Decade (HGOTD) -> 0

Top India Grosser -> PK (2014) - INR 339.1 crore net

Top Overseas Grosser -> PK (2014) - $47.2 million

Top Worldwide Grosser -> PK (2014) - INR 767 crores gross

Lowest Grosser (India only) -> Namak (1996) - INR 0.3 crore net*

Best Phase -> 6 Films without any Flops (Flops or Disaster) starting Jeete Hain Shaan Se (1988) till Hum Bhi Insaan Hai (1989), 6 Films without any Flops (Flops or Disaster) starting Zahreelay (1990) till Jeen Do (1990), 6 Films without any Flops (Flops or Disaster) starting Jeena Marna Tere Sang (1992) till Zamane Se Kya Darna (1994)

Worst Phase -> 17 Films without any Clean Hits (Hit/Super Hit/Blockbuster) starting Sarhad Paar (2006) till Rascals (2011)

Highest No. of Films in a Year -> 7 Films in 1991

Debut Film -> Rocky (1981)

Last Released Film -> Panipat (2019)

Best Films of his Career (In Box Office Term only) -> Lage Raho Munna Bhai, Naam, Saajan, Khalnayak, Munna Bhai M.B.B.S

Top Footfall -> PK (2014) - 3.5 crores

Upcoming Movies -> Sadak 2, Shamshera, Bhuj: The Pride of India, KGF: Chapter 2, Prithviraj, Torbaaz

Note - We don't have the box office data of a few of the films of Sanjay Dutt. Hence we have kept the collection part as blank. Once, we have those data we will fill that.

* As the box office data of a few of the films of Sanjay Dutt is not available these parts are not updated yet. Once, those received it will be updated.
